name: Walbang!
description:
You are your worst enemy. This is why your bullets bounce off walls and deal double damage to you. Fend off a wave of pirates along with the very cannonballs you shoot them with. 

How to play: Aim with your mouse and click to shoot the enemy.

Programmer - Sajid2001

Level Designer - Logan

Art - Calcym, ZoroToaster

SFX - themasterdragon2

Music - Calcym
